welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful West Islip, where small-town charm meets stunning natural landscapes. Known for its scenic beaches and charming shops, we invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport is primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport is primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as Air France and Korean Air.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves mainly Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: One of the largest terminals, serving international and domestic airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serves mainly British Airways and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serves American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Limited free access, premium options available for purchase.
